API_Description: Sets the date when a review was responded to.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'setReviewRespondedDate' suggests that it is used to set a date related to a review response. This is a common functionality in collaboration tools to track when actions are taken.
Returns_Reason: The method name 'setReviewRespondedDate' implies that it performs an action (setting a date) without returning a value, which is typical for setter methods.

doc.description: The document object for which the review responded date is being set.
doc.description_reason: The parameter name 'doc' suggests it is related to a document, which is likely the subject of the review.
doc.type_reason: The parameter is likely an object because it represents a document, which typically has multiple properties and methods associated with it.
